3: Never thought you also moved Tifa's body to the base.
With her viral density, are you not afraid of hurting this lil' lass?
The base facilities should be enough of a barrier. Just reading the M.I.N.D. should be safe. No need to worry.
And, this is a rare chance to gain information about the enemy. I cannot let this go to waste.
If there are any abnormalities, we will help you eject immediately.
Liv connects herself to the tattered remains of Tifa—
